name: Survive (itch) (akai_0okami)
description:
You are a human in the zombie apocalypse. Survive.

Made for Weekly Game Jam 33.

Credits

  • Game made using GameMaker: Studio
  • Graphics made using Aseprite and GIMP
  • Punch SFX by CGEffex (https://freesound.org/people/CGEffex/sounds/98341/)
  • Zombie eating SFX by indieground (https://freesound.org/people/indieground/sounds/235798/)
  • Gunshot by Ben Jaszczak (https://opengameart.org/content/the-free-firearm-sound-library)
  • Zombie death by Ogrebane (https://opengameart.org/content/monster-sound-pack-volume-1)
  • Pick up SFX by joedeshon (https://freesound.org/people/joedeshon/sounds/139064/)
  • Horror Ambience by Vinrax (https://opengameart.org/content/horror-ambient)
  • Bittersweet (ending music) by Kevin MacLeod (http://incompetech.com/)
